amendatorysection.catchline: Class V school district; board of education; members; election by district; procedure; qualifications.
amendatorysection.para: The board of education of a Class V school district shall consist of nine members. One member shall be elected from each district pursuant to section 32-545. Each elected member shall be a resident of the district for at least six months prior to the election. Each candidate for election to and each member of the board of education shall be a taxpayer in and a resident of the district of such school district as designated pursuant to section 32-552.

crossreference.para: For qualifications of members of board of education, see section 79-543.
